mapper.insert: insert into recently_view (exh_seq, member_id, recently_date) values (#{exh_seq}, #{member_id}, sysdate + 9/24)
mapper.delete: delete recently_view where member_id = #{member_id} and exh_seq = #{exh_seq}
mapper.select: select * from recently_view where member_id = #{member_id} and exh_seq = #{exh_seq}

select rnum,exh_seq,recently_date,exh_title,exh_place,exh_price,exh_imgurl,exh_realmName,exh_startDate,exh_endDate,exh_value from exhibition, (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by recently_date desc) rnum, exh_seq seq,recently_date from recently_view where member_id = #{member_id}) where exh_seq = seq and rnum BETWEEN ((#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}+1) and (#{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) ORDER BY rnum
select count(*) from recently_view where member_id = #{member_id}
select count(*) from recently_view where exh_seq = #{exh_seq} and member_id = #{member_id}
